basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=0.4 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa OT97 (MIC=0.9 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis Bs11 (MIC=0.3 µM), Bacillus megaterium Bm11 (MIC=0.2 µM), Staphylococcus aureus Cowan 1 (MIC=2 µM), Streptococcus pyogenes (MIC=0.1 µM).
